whitecat.core
Class RoleBooster

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.ClassLoader
      java.security.SecureClassLoader
          whitecat.core.RoleBooster

public class RoleBooster
extends java.security.SecureClassLoader

This is the central role engine of the White Cat approach. Each role operation is performed starting from this class. The idea is the following: once an agent requires a role injection, the role is applied to the proxy of the agent, that must be passed to the role engine itself. From the proxy it is created a subclass (compatible with the proxy class itself) and this subclass is forced to implement the role interface. Each method of such implementation is used as a forwarder to the real role instance, that is owned by the agent itself.

Author:
Luca Ferrari - cat4hire (at) sourceforge.net

The role injection type.

manipulationCounter

private int manipulationCounter
A counter for the number of manipulation performed by this engine. Such number will be used to create the name of the subclass that the engine is manipulating, this to prevent two classes to have the same name and thus to prevent a linkage error.

annotationClassName

private java.lang.String annotationClassName

Method Detail

getManipulationCounter

protected final int getManipulationCounter()
Provides the value of the manipulationCounter field. Please note that the manipulation counter is automatically increased by this operation, thus the counter acts like an SQL sequence: once it has been read, it is also increased.

Returns:
the manipulationCounter

setInjectionType

public final void setInjectionType(RoleInjectionType injectionType)
Sets the value of the injectionType field as specified by the value of injectionType. This method sets also the manipulation active flag depending on the type of manipulation. If the injection type is none, then the manipulating flag will be activated, otherwise it will set to false.

Parameters:
injectionType - the injectionType to set

hasRoleAnnotation

private final boolean hasRoleAnnotation(AgentProxy roled,
                                        java.lang.Class annotationClass)
This method searches for a role type within a proxy of an agent. The method searches between the annotations of the proxy to see if the specified annotation type is present between those of the proxy.

Parameters:
roled - the proxy to analyze
annotationClass - the type of annotation (and thus of role visibility) to search for
Returns:
true if the proxy has the specified role

hasPublicRole

private final boolean hasPublicRole(AgentProxy roled,
                                    boolean annotation)
This method checks for the validity of a role annotation. The method checks if the proxy is annotated with the PublicRole annotation, and then checks if the annotation has a not-null value for the role itnerface or the role annotation.

Parameters:
roled - the proxy to check
annotation - true if the PublicRole.annotationClass() must be not-empty, false if the PublicRole.roleInterface() must be not-empty.
Returns:
true if the proxy has the role with the specified settings

hasPublicRoleInterface

public final boolean hasPublicRoleInterface(AgentProxy proxy)
Determines if the proxy is currently playing a visible (i.e., public) role. A publi role must be marked thru the @PublicRole annotation.

Parameters:
proxy - the proxy to analyze.
Returns:
true if the proxy is playing a public role.

Returns:

Returns:

injectPublicRole

                                  throws WCException

WCException

removeUntilRole

public AgentProxy removeUntilRole(WCAgent agent,
                                  AgentProxy proxy,
                                  IRole role)
                           throws WCException
Removes all the applied roles until the specified one (included). Since the roles are applied to a proxy by means of subclasses implementing the role interfaces, this method simply removes a role returnin a proxy that is the instance of the superclass of the class when the specified role has been applied. This means that the agent will loose all the role acquired since the specified one.

Parameters:
agent - the agent that wants to remove the role
proxy - the proxy to change
role - the role to remove
Returns:
the new instance of the agent proxy without all the roles until the specified one
Throws:
WCException - if something goes wrong

removePublicRole

public AgentProxy removePublicRole(WCAgent agent,
                                   AgentProxy proxy,
                                   IRole role)
                            throws WCException
Throws:
WCException

private byte[] addRoleToProxyThruAnnotation(javassist.ClassPool pool,
                                            javassist.CtClass baseProxyClass,
                                            java.lang.String subProxyClassName)
                                     throws javassist.CannotCompileException,
                                            java.io.IOException
Creates the bytecode for the class of a proxy with the role annotation injected.

Parameters:
pool - the class pool to use
baseProxyClass - the base proxy class to use as the superclass of the new proxy class created
subProxyClassName - the name for the subclass
Returns:
the byte array with the bytecode of the class with the annotation
Throws:
javassist.CannotCompileException - if some problem occurs with javassist
java.io.IOException - if a problem occurs when converting the stream of a classfile to a byte array

This method returns true if the role engine is involved in a manipulation that includes an annotation.

Returns:
true if the role engine is adding or removing an annotation from a role

addRoleToProxy

private javassist.CtClass addRoleToProxy(javassist.ClassPool pool,
                                         javassist.CtClass baseProxyClass)
                                  throws javassist.NotFoundException,
                                         javassist.CannotCompileException
Parameters:
pool -
baseProxyClass -
Throws:
javassist.NotFoundException
javassist.CannotCompileException

addRoleToProxyThruSubClass

private javassist.CtClass addRoleToProxyThruSubClass(javassist.ClassPool pool,
                                                     javassist.CtClass baseProxyClass,
                                                     java.lang.String subProxyName,
                                                     java.lang.String publicRoleInterfaceName,
                                                     java.lang.String roleInstanceAccessKey,
                                                     java.lang.String roleClassName,
                                                     MethodForwarderGenerator methodForwarder)
                                              throws javassist.NotFoundException,
                                                     javassist.CannotCompileException,
                                                     WCForwarderMethodException
This method is used to add a role to the proxy of an agent. This method creates a subclass of the proxy and forces this class to implement the role itnerface. Each method of the interface is implemented as a forwarder to the role instance.

Parameters:
pool - the class pool used for the bytecode manipulation
baseProxyClass - the proxy class that must be subclassed
subProxyName - the fully qualified name of the proxy subclass, that is the name which will be used in the Java system for such class
publicRoleInterfaceName - the name of the public interface to inject into the proxy class
roleInstanceAccessKey - the string that will be used as a key for the role access thru the proxy
roleClassName - the name of the class of the concrete role implementation, used to make a cast to right type of the object when the forwarder methods will be created
Returns:
the Javassist CtClass object that represents the subclass of the proxy
Throws:
javassist.NotFoundException - if a class is not found in the Java system
javassist.CannotCompileException - if there is a problem with the compilation of the code
WCForwarderMethodException

getID

protected final int getID()
Returns an identifier of this Role Engine. The default implementation is to return the Java object hash code as identifier. This method is used to construct an unique name of role implementation key.

Returns:
the identifier of this role engine instance

getRoleImplementationAccessKey

private final java.lang.String getRoleImplementationAccessKey(java.lang.String publicRoleInterfaceName)
Constrcuts an unique role implementation access key, that is a string key that will be used when the forwarding methods need to access the role reference.

Parameters:
publicRoleInterfaceName. - This method will construct a key composing the public role interface name and the id of the role engine (thru the method getID()).
Returns:
the string to be used as key for identifying a role instance

removeRoleFromProxyThruSuperclass

public javassist.CtClass removeRoleFromProxyThruSuperclass(javassist.ClassPool pool,
                                                           javassist.CtClass nowProxyClass,
                                                           java.lang.String proxyName)
                                                    throws javassist.NotFoundException,
                                                           javassist.CannotCompileException
Throws:
javassist.NotFoundException
javassist.CannotCompileException

getSubClassNameSuffix

protected final java.lang.String getSubClassNameSuffix()
Returns the name suffix to append to a class name in order to get a new name for a class. The postfix is built with the fixed string "_roled_" and the manipulation counter (i.e., how many classes this engione has manipulated) and the id of the engine itself.

Returns:
the string that must be used as suffix for the class name

isManipulatedClass

public final boolean isManipulatedClass(java.lang.Class classToCheck)
Checks if the specified class has been manipulated by the role engine. A class is manipulated if it implements the IManipulatedClass interface.

Parameters:
classToCheck - the class to check
Returns:
true if the class implements the IManipulatedClass interface
